lead_paragraph: Singapore's first Olympic gold medalist, swimmer Joseph Schooling, said on Tuesday he was looking to beat the world record for 100 meters butterfly and planned to compete in two more events at the next Olympics in Tokyo.

headline.main: Singapore Swimmer Joseph Schooling Eyes More Olympic Glory
headline.print_headline: Singapore Swimmer Joseph Schooling Eyes More Olympic Glory
